CTGAN Synthesis.description: Generates synthetic data using the CTGAN model, which is a generative adversarial network tailored for tabular data.
CTGAN Synthesis.use_case: Used for generating realistic synthetic tabular data while preserving the relationships in the original data.

Epochs.description: Number of training epochs for the CTGAN model.

Batch Size.description: Number of samples per training batch.

Generator Learning Rate.description: Learning rate for the generator network.
